# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```


# Load data

```{r}
gc <- read_csv("data/GC_Data/GC_Data_Table.csv")
```

# Explore data

```{r}
gc %>% filter(
  sample_type != "Blank",
  str_detect(file_name, "30Sept"),
  str_detect(sample_type, "Failed", negate = TRUE),
  str_detect(file_name, "TC_13", negate = TRUE),
  str_detect(file_name, "TC_21", negate = TRUE),
  str_detect(file_name, "TC_16", negate = TRUE),
  str_detect(file_name, "TC_08", negate = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    volume_ml = case_when(
      sample_type == "0.25ml_1pcMix" ~ 0.25,
      sample_type == "0.5ml_1pcMix" ~ 0.5,
      sample_type == "1ml_1pcMix" ~ 1
        )
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = volume_ml,
      y = peak_area,
      color = gas
      )
  ) +
  geom_point(
    size = 2,
    alpha = 0.7
  ) +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm",
    formula = "y~x",
    se = FALSE,
    size = 0.5
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1))
#plotly::ggplotly()
```
